For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. item.title: Probando nomas
item.description: un ggplot clasico library(ggplot2) ggplot(diamonds) + geom_jitter(aes(x = carat, y = cut, color = price)) + scale_color_viridis_c(option = "inferno") y otro con fondo blanco ggplot(diamonds) + geom_jitter(aes(x = carat, y = cut, color = price)) + scale_color_viridis_c(option = "inferno") + theme_void()

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.
